g.text: Home Purchasing Happy Path - Buyer's Perspective
Base on your income and credit history etc, we assess
you have a potential borrowing limit of xxx dollars
Calculates the affordable range of total home price,
Yo, pls find me some candidates in
There you go. Wanna pay a visit?
Decides on a suitable home candidate
Here's an offer. Let's do this thing
Congrats! Now we have a binding contract
Here's a deposit as a token of commitment
Deposit escrowed. Time to sort out the financing
Hey, I have an accepted offer. Can you process my financing
Sure, but need to send an agent to appraise first
OK, we're committed to your actual financing of xxx dollars
It's time. Now cut me a bank draft with down payment, misec credit adjustments, and my fees
Sure, why not. Here's my life savings
The deed is done. You will get your official title in a few months. But the property is legally yours now
Feel free to move in any time now
